post_text: December 17, 2016 at 9:20 AM#1Hi,I'm looking for a macro that assigns the functions of an arbitrary executor.Something like:assign temp execbutton1assign load execbutton2assign go execbutton3assign temp fader @I want to create three or four macros for standard executor functions...If you have any ideas please let me know.Thanks, Bastian
